text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. NVDA inched 0.12% higher to $903.56 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX rising 0.11% to 5,254.35 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA rising 0.12% to 39,807.37. The stock's rise snapped a two-day losing streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed... Shares of NVIDIA Corp.
        
NVDA

        
      inched 0.12% higher to $903.56 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index
        
SPX

        
      rising 0.11% to 5,254.35 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average
        
DJIA

        
      rising 0.12% to 39,807.37. The stock's rise snapped a two-day losing streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed $70.44 below its 52-week high ($974.00), which the company achieved on March 8th. Trading volume (43.0 M) remained 12.4 million below its 50-day average volume of 55.4 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. See original version of this story Trading in General Electric’s power-generation spinoff began this week. The spinoff itself takes place on April 2. So far, trading has hewed pretty close to Wall Street estimates.
